c74object.name: j.out
c74object.description: j.out is an output conduit for control signals in a Jamoma model (most often these are Jitter matrices), much like j.out~ is for audio signals. It allows to turn on or off messages output from the model or bypass the value processing in the model when used in combination with j.in
c74object.discussion:
Control input and output management provided by j.in and j.out are part of the services enabled by the amenities feature of a Jamoma model. When a model's amenities attribute is set to all or data, several nodes are created under the model namespace so these features can be remotely accessed.
When enable, j.in or j.out creates a data/active node. This internal parameter allows to toggle control signal input and output of the model.
When used in combination, paired j.in and j.out create a data/bypass node. When set to 1, this internal parameter allows to sent control signal coming at the model input straight to its output (that is, without passing through the whole processing chain of the model).
The use of j.in and j.out also creates data/in.<argument> and data/out.<argument> respectively, allowing to remotely send or receive control signal to a model input or output.
When amenities is set to none, these features provided by j.in and j.out are disabled and the internal parameters are removed from the model's namespace.

inlet.digest: Values to output from the model
inlet.description: Values to output from the model

objarg.name: instance name
objarg.digest: Instance name to subscribe output in the Jamoma model namespace
objarg.description:
An argument to j.out sets an instance name to subscribe output in the model namespace. The full address of this node will be <model name>/data/out.<argument>
It also sets the name of a j.out to pair with

method.name: anything
method.digest: Value to output from the model
method.description:
Values coming at j.out inlet are output at j.out leftmost outlet.
When paired with a j.in object and bypass attribute set to 1, values coming at j.in inlet are silenced from its outlet and directly received by j.out

method.name: dump
method.description: The dump message outputs all attributes value out of j.out rightmost outlet

attribute.name: mute
attribute.description: The mute attribute toggles value output. This attribute is internally linked to the model's internal parameter data/active

attribute.name: type
attribute.digest: Set the type of the output
attribute.description: The type attribute sets the type of the outcoming values (default = control)
